title: Dihydrotestosterone (DHT) Megadose
author: Article written by Spirituality Zone
cleaned_text: sex hormone, that is responsible for a man's sexual characteristics. The amount of DHT in the body correlates with how much Testosterone and 5-alpha reductase is in the body.
